heroDescription: Enhance your reading journey with intelligent summaries, insights, and personalized recommendations powered by advanced AI technology.
featuresSubtitle: Discover how AI enhances your reading experience
aiReadingDesc: Get intelligent summaries and insights from your books using advanced AI technology.
bookManagementDesc: Organize your books into shelves with progress tracking and personalized recommendations.
fastLocalDesc: Enjoy fast processing with local AI deployment for privacy and performance.
multipleFormatsDesc: Support for various book formats including FB2 and more coming soon.
communityDesc: Share reviews, ratings, and discuss books with other readers.
personalizedDesc: Get book recommendations tailored to your reading preferences and history.
ctaTitle: Ready to Transform Your Reading Experience?
ctaDescription: Join thousands of readers who are already enjoying AI-enhanced book experiences
contactSubtitle: Have questions or feedback? Reach out to us through any of these channels:
